Class DAO<T>

java.lang.Object
DAO.DAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of object that the DAO is managing (e.g., User, Product).
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApplianceDao, ShoppingDao, UserDao
public abstract class DAO<T> extends Object
Abstract class providing generic database operations for CRUD functionality. This class provides methods for initialising a database connection, creating tables, inserting, updating, deleting records, and querying the database.

  • Method Details

    • changeConnection

      public void changeConnection(Connector connector)
      Changes the connection provider for this DAO.
      Parameters:
      connector - the new connection provider

    • initializeDBConnection

      public void initializeDBConnection()
      Initializes the database connection using the provided connector.

    • setAllowedTables

      public void setAllowedTables(String table)
      Adds a table name to the list of allowed tables.
      Parameters:
      table - the table name to be added

    • createTable

      public boolean createTable(String name, String schema)
      Creates a new table in the database using the provided schema.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the table
      schema - the schema definition for the table
      Returns:
      true if the table was created successfully, false if it already exists

    • checkTableExists

      public boolean checkTableExists(String name)
      Checks if a table exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the table to check
      Returns:
      true if the table exists, false otherwise

    • addTableMap

      protected void addTableMap(String tableName, String schema)
      Adds a table schema to the internal table map.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table
      schema - the schema definition for the table

    • initAllTables

      protected void initAllTables(HashMap<String,String> tables)
      Initialises all tables using the provided schema map.
      Parameters:
      tables - the map of table names to schemas

    • addNew

      public boolean addNew(String tableName, Map<String,Object> fields)
      Adds a new record to the specified table.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table
      fields - a map of column names and their corresponding values
      Returns:
      true if the record was added successfully, false otherwise

    • getById

      protected ResultSet getById(String query, int id) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a record by its ID.
      Parameters:
      query - the SQL query to execute
      id - the ID of the record to retrieve
      Returns:
      the ResultSet containing the record data
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • deleteById

      public int deleteById(String tableName, Map<String,Object> conditions)
      Deletes a record by its ID from the specified table.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table
      conditions - a map of column names and their corresponding values for deletion criteria
      Returns:
      the number of affected rows
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the table is not in the allowed list or the conditions are invalid

    • findAll

      public abstract ArrayList<T> findAll(int optionalId, HashMap<String,Object> sortParams)
      Finds all records in the database, optionally filtered by ID and sorted.
      Parameters:
      optionalId - an optional ID to filter the records (can be null or 0)
      sortParams - a map of sorting parameters (e.g., column name, sort order)
      Returns:
      a list of records

    • updateById

      public abstract int updateById(int id, String table, Map<String,Object> updateFields)
      Updates a record in the specified table by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the record to update
      table - the name of the table
      updateFields - a map of column names and their updated values
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the update
